name: mind_managed2
description: A MERN stack application for mind management

scripts.dev:quiet: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client:quiet"
scripts.client:quiet: cd client && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client

author: Damian De Leon
